arb-ltipp.title: Beefy Ã— Arbitrum LTIPP
arb-ltipp.description: Earn extra incentives awarded to Beefy CLM vaults through Arbitrum's Long Term Incentives Pilot Program ('LTIPP'). Beefy users earn additional $ARB tokens for trying out selected CLM products. Rewards accrue linearly over time depending on the user's TVL. Simply use the 'Deposit' button in the Boost module to enter the boost, and then manually claim your LTIPP rewards whenever you're ready.

zap-v3.title: Zap V3 Launch
zap-v3.description: Celebrate Zap V3 launch with Beefy's Optimism Governance Fund campaign. Users earn $OP tokens for utilizing Zap V3 on Optimism, with monthly rewards and partner launchpool boosts on select vaults.
